column2: Privacy Policy   NaturalNews.com never rents or sells emails to third parties. We honor the privacy of our members and users, and unlike some other social networking sites, we DO NOT share user details with advertisers.

Privacy Policy   NaturalNews.com never rents or sells emails to third parties. We honor the privacy of our members and users, and unlike some other social networking sites, we DO NOT share user details with advertisers.
NaturalNews.com honors all email unsubscribe requests and makes every attempt to honor the privacy of its members, viewers and sponsors.
To opt-out of NaturalNews emails, simply click the "unsubscribe" link found at the bottom of any email from NaturalNews.
